=== Oneiric Features ===

==== Agile delivery of Ubuntu One software ====
<nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/desktop-o-ubuntuone-agile-delivery-of-u1|Blueprint]]</nowiki> - Deliver Ubuntu One software in a manner that accommodates the needs of a client paired with a constantly evolving online service.

==== Improved Unity integration ====
<nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/desktop-o-ubuntuone-improve-unity-integration|Blueprint]]</nowiki> - Continue to improve integration between Ubuntu One and Unity.

==== Gracefully show Ubuntu One storage plan upgrades and quota changes in the desktop ====
<nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntuone-client/+spec/desktop-o-ubuntuone-protocol-quota-change|Blueprint]]</nowiki> - Let user know when Ubuntu One plan upgrades and quota changes happen.
